children.subtitle: Docker Files
children.content: Add the Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml to the root of the project, to create the container you must execute the command docker-compose up.

childs:
# Dockerfile 
 FROM php:8.2-apache 
ARG DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive 

RUN apt-get update \ 
	&& apt-get install -y nodejs \ 
	&& apt-get install -y npm \ 
	 
	&& apt-get install -y default-mysql-client \ 
	 
	&& apt-get install -y curl \ 
	 
	&& apt-get install -y zsh \ 
	 
	&& apt-get install -y wget \ 
	 
	&& apt-get install -y git \

# docker-compose.yml 
version: "3.8"
services:
	app:
		container_name: lion-framework-app
		build:
			context: .
			dockerfile: Dockerfile
		... (rest of docker-compose.yml)

; config

[supervisord]
user=root
nodaemon=true
logfile=/var/www/html/storage/logs/supervisord/supervisord.log

; server

[program:web-server]
command=php lion serve --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
... (rest of supervisord.conf)
